name: FirstQuadrant
headline: Accelerate progress with infinitely scalable AI sales
description: Turn B2B sales into a fully scalable and fully autonomous system with artificial intelligence. FirstQuadrant encompasses a complete suite of AI tools for inbound, outbound, and nurturing sales, ensuring a unified approach to relationship management.
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:saas; industry:sales; industry:sales-enablement; industry:ai; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Carlo Badini, Founder/CEO
founders.description: Co-founder at FirstQuadrdant. Prior to FirstQuadrant, Carlo founded a Swiss design agency at the age of 20 and bootstrapped it to 40 employees and multiple millions in revenue. He has been recognised by EY Entrepreneur of the Year and Forbes 30 Under 30.

founders.name: Anand Chowdhary, Founder/CTO/CPO
founders.description: Co-founder, CTO, CPO at FirstQuadrant. Previously founded rent-to-own furniture brand Pabio, accessibility tech startup Oswald Labs, and fashion ecommerce company Melangebox. Top open-source contributor, listed as a GitHub Star and in Forbes 30 Under 30.

# Infinitely scalableB2B sales with AI
Grow your business exponentially with predictable, fully-automated sales using cutting-edge AI.
Apply for access
Backed by Y Combinator
## The AI sales platform
Turn B2B sales into a fully scalable and fully autonomous system with artificial intelligence.
![Screenshot of FirstQuadrant](https://res.cloudinary.com/dhzg4g10h/image/upload/f_svg,c_limit,w_1199,q_auto/v1/marketing/v7uf38lkcw5lrnl05y5x.svg)
a
c
c
Accept
Accept message and schedule
The fastest-growing YC startups use FirstQuadrant
![SimpleHash, Svix, Cal.com, Infisical, CoCEO](https://res.cloudinary.com/dhzg4g10h/image/upload/f_auto,c_limit,w_3200,q_auto/v1691495817/marketing/logos-v3_yzdqxm.svg)
## Holistic tooling
FirstQuadrant encompasses a complete suite of AI tools for inbound, outbound, and nurturing sales, ensuring a unified approach to relationship management.
Outbound
Inbound
Nurturing
## Reach your leads
FirstQuadrant automatically finds and enriches leads based on your targeting. Sending out messages to the right person at the right time.
### In-depth lead sourcing
Find the right leads based on your ICP either through our built-in prospecting tool or by importing a CSV.
![](https://res.cloudinary.com/dhzg4g10h/image/upload/f_auto,c_limit,w_500,q_auto/v1689004788/marketing/add-audience_fe8z3h.png)
### Comprehensive lead enrichment
FirstQuadrant aggregates data from various sources to create a detailed profile of each prospect.
![](https://res.cloudinary.com/dhzg4g10h/image/upload/f_auto,c_limit,w_500,q_auto/v1689004788/marketing/rydww8esm0tgxy1b7rzh.png)
> I don’t say this lightly, but FirstQuadrant is absolutely astounding. In less than a month, FirstQuadrant booked multiple meetings on a weekly basis without me lifting a finger. My mind is blown.
![](https://res.cloudinary.com/dhzg4g10h/image/upload/f_auto,c_limit,w_400,q_auto/v1705956296/marketing/ki4pqjstxtabpdvxvbde.png)
Matthew Dukes
Founder, CoCEO
## Extensive deliverability
Ensuring emails reach inboxes with end-to-end deliverability solutions.
### Custom domains
FirstQuadrant allows you to connect customized domains for your outbound activities to protect the reputation of your primary domain.
### All ESPs supported
FirstQuadrant lets you connect mailboxes from Google, Microsoft, Zoho, or any other email service provider to ensure seamless email delivery.
### Smart scheduling
FirstQuadrant only sends emails in each recipient’s time zone, ensuring your messages reach the inbox at the most optimal time.
### Email verification
FirstQuadrant utilizes email verification to authenticate addresses, ensuring your outbound messages reach genuine and active email boxes.
### Mailbox rotation
FirstQuadrant uses maintenance and active mailboxes and allows you to rotate them as soon as any of them get a low deliverability score.
### Spam checker
FirstQuadrant ensures optimal email delivery by continuously utilizing spam checkers to detect and counteract potential delivery issues.
## Personalized messaging
Through the use of comprehensive lead enrichment and GPT-4, FirstQuadrant is able to create personalized and dynamic messages for each prospect.
Subject
Enhancing DoorDash's user experience with Centercode
## Engaging conversations
FirstQuadrant seamlessly manages and responds to incoming emails, ensuring engaging and call-to-action oriented conversations with every prospect.
### Independent objection handling
FirstQuadrant addresses objections using company data and predefined sales scripts.
![](https://res.cloudinary.com/dhzg4g10h/image/upload/f_auto,c_limit,w_500,q_auto/v1705954748/marketing/rvznoprav83vgsvhwks1.png)
### Dynamic follow-ups
FirstQuadrant autonomously coordinates precise, timely follow-ups with prospects.
![](https://res.cloudinary.com/dhzg4g10h/image/upload/f_auto,c_limit,w_500,q_auto/v1689007779/marketing/gyxhycaeoswl5zfvcqn8.png)
### Responsive replies
FirstQuadrant classifies incoming emails and responds smartly and independently.
![](https://res.cloudinary.com/dhzg4g10h/image/upload/f_auto,c_limit,w_500,q_auto/v1705957277/marketing/voqnwwm0awmzfgfdwd7g.png)
### Context-aware actionsComing soon
FirstQuadrant determines the most effective next step in interactions with prospects.
![](https://res.cloudinary.com/dhzg4g10h/image/upload/f_auto,c_limit,w_500,q_auto/v1705954825/marketing/h0wdksxbmd7as8owq6zf.png)
Coming soon
## Intelligent CRM nurturing
FirstQuadrant reactivates dormant CRM contacts by leveraging external triggers such as company updates to pro-actively send timely, relevant messages.
![](https://res.cloudinary.com/dhzg4g10h/image/upload/f_auto,c_limit,w_1828,q_auto/v1705956296/marketing/qd7hrei0llzuvi2ho2u6.png)
## Comprehensive analytics
Get an in-depth view of your sales performance, and track and measure the overall effectiveness of your inbound, outbound and nurturing strategies.
![](https://res.cloudinary.com/dhzg4g10h/image/upload/f_auto,c_limit,w_2006,q_auto/v1705956296/marketing/gottbqbkxwb7cjio9wrt.png)
## Initiate autopilot
Take control, or let the AI lead — approve outgoing messages manually or switch on autopilot and let FirstQuadrant handle campaigns and schedule calls fully autonomously.
## Customer testimonials
The fastest-growing startups rely on FirstQuadrant to manage their sales process.
![](https://res.cloudinary.com/dhzg4g10h/image/upload/marketing/xnyda2uauhji5iyacdjx.svg)![Stacker](https://res.cloudinary.com/dhzg4g10h/image/upload/marketing/ixpmv9yi1k636rlhw1fg.svg)
Stacker fully automated its inbound and outbound sales efforts using FirstQuadrant.
[Read more](https://firstquadrant.ai/</customers/stacker>)
![](https://res.cloudinary.com/dhzg4g10h/image/upload/marketing/j2wgqw7mqcmiujecn5ni.svg)![El Niño](https://res.cloudinary.com/dhzg4g10h/image/upload/marketing/dq9wmpo0ky30qumzrjlk.svg)
FirstQuadrant schedules meetings on autopilot for El Niño's sales team.
[Read more](https://firstquadrant.ai/</customers/el-nino>)
![](https://res.cloudinary.com/dhzg4g10h/image/upload/marketing/ezd81t1v9vv12shzat2u.svg)![unSurvey](https://res.cloudinary.com/dhzg4g10h/image/upload/marketing/demz04kyqngpgosjsehh.svg)
unSurvey scales sales exponentially with a team of one and FirstQuadrant.
[Read more](https://firstquadrant.ai/</customers/unsurvey>)
## Designed & engineered for performance
FirstQuadrant is meticulously designed for the modern sales organization and comes with a variety of additional features.
### Lightning fast
Get your B2B outbound activities up and running in no time with our ultra-fast, intuitive interface and shortcuts for all major actions.
### Open and link tracking
Gain critical insights into prospect behavior with our tracking system. Know when your email is opened and links clicked.
### Calendly and Cal.com integrations
Set your conversion goals easily with our seamless integration with the most popular scheduling apps and ensure efficient meeting arrangements.
### Unlimited seats
With FirstQuadrant, there's no limit to teamwork. Our pricing includes unlimited users option, allowing the entire team to collaborate.
### Comprehensive analytics
Gain insight into the effectiveness of your outbound sales with our analytics dashboard. Track your progress and measure conversion rates.
### Dark mode
Experience seamless transitions between light and dark themes in FirstQuadrant based on your preference.
## Up and to the right

generated_description:
**FirstQuadrant: The Future of Scalable AI Sales**

Founded in 2020 and incubated in Y Combinator's Summer 2021 batch, FirstQuadrant is a San Francisco-based startup on a mission to revolutionize B2B sales through artificial intelligence. With just a two-person team (including Group Partner Nan), they’ve developed a powerful suite of tools designed to convert traditional sales processes into fully autonomous systems.

At its core, FirstQuadrant provides a unified platform for inbound, outbound, and nurturing sales processes. This means companies can leverage their tools to streamline how they connect with leads—automatically sourcing and enriching potential clients, sending personalized messages, and engaging through conversations that feel less robotic and more human. Imagine if your sales team could book meetings with prospects without constant manual intervention—that's what they claim to deliver.

The platform tackles common sales challenges like lead sourcing, email deliverability, and engagement, employing advanced features such as smart scheduling and dynamic follow-ups. It's equipped to ensure your outreach reaches the right people at the right time, all while maintaining message integrity and avoid spam filters.

One of the standout aspects of FirstQuadrant is their emphasis on analytics and reporting. Users can track the effectiveness of their sales strategies in real-time—adjusting tactics based on what works best. They also offer support for unlimited users, ensuring that teams can collaborate freely without being constrained by user limits, and they’ve designed their interface to be responsive and user-friendly.

FirstQuadrant already counts some of the fastest-growing startups among its customers, helping them automate their sales processes and scale exponentially. Notable testimonials underscore the ease and effectiveness of using their platform; one founder marvels at the increase in booked meetings after integrating FirstQuadrant’s solutions. 

If you’re looking to elevate your sales game with AI, FirstQuadrant is worth exploring. Visit their website at [firstquadrant.ai](https://firstquadrant.ai) for more information, including how to apply for access to their platform. As the AI landscape evolves, FirstQuadrant is positioning itself as a key player in making sales more efficient, effective, and human-centric.
